text: Paull Shin (Shin Hobom, Korean: 신호범; September 27, 1935 - April 12, 2021) was an American politician. He was a member of the Washington State Senate from 1999 to 2014. He was the first Korean American ever elected to the Washington State Legislature. Shin was a member of the Democratic Party. He was born in Paju, South Korea. In January 2014, Shin was diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease.State Sen. Paull Shin resigns, citing Alzheimer’s He died from problems caused by the disease on April 12, 2021 in Edmonds, Washington at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Washington (state) Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Paull Shin
